description: This file provides utility functions for extracting and formatting version information from a given 'info' object, expected to contain a 'version' key. It includes functions GetVersion and GetVersionString that process version data provided as a list or string.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts a version list [major, minor, patch] from the input 'info' dictionary, handling 'version' key as either a string or list, and defaults missing components to 1.0.0.

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Returns the version as a dot-separated string by calling GetVersion and joining its output.
